page.title: 10Blandford - Beat Officer
page.content: 4 of our 49 questions to PC Knight 779 {Gayle.How many hours do you work a {day?}We do 8 hour shifts & 40 hour weeks over the year.But its often not like that.I've worked 68 hours this week already but I doubt if I'll do 40 next.{Lorna.What are the commonest {crimes for which people are arrested {in Blandford?}Theft,vandalism & drunk- eness.On average 150 arrests a year. {Gemma.Do you have days when you don't {go out of the Police Station?}I have a role called Community Beat Officer.I'm the only one & its only me who uses a pedal cycle.I've got lots of responsibilities,one is to schools & one is to people in the town.I try not to spend a whole day in the Station & balance my writing with time outside.{ {Robert.Do Police carry guns round {here?}No, not at all.
